summary.span: 表示用于填充 和更新数据源的一组 SQL 命令和一个数据库连接。

span.span: Represents a set of SQL commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用作之间的桥梁和用于检索和保存数据的数据源。The serves as a bridge between a and a data source for retrieving and saving data. 通过映射提供此桥，这将更改中的数据以匹配数据源中的数据并，这将更改以匹配中的数据的数据源中的数据。The provides this bridge by mapping , which changes the data in the to match the data in the data source, and , which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the . 如果要连接到 SQL Server 数据库，则可以通过增加整体性能连同其关联和对象。If you are connecting to a SQL Server database, you can increase overall performance by using the along with its associated and objects. 对于 OLE DB 支持的数据源，使用及其关联和对象。For OLE DB-supported data sources, use the with its associated and objects. 对于支持 ODBC 的数据源，使用及其关联和对象。For ODBC-supported data sources, use the with its associated and objects. 对于 Oracle 数据库，请使用及其关联和对象。For Oracle databases, use the with its associated and objects. 实例时创建读/写属性设置为初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`false`，未调用，并且新添加的行都被视为插入的行。If `false`, is not called, and the newly added rows are treated as inserted rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用期间`Update`方法的`DataAdapter`，数据库可以将数据发送回 ADO.NET 应用程序作为输出参数或作为结果集的第一个返回的记录。During a call to the `Update` method of a `DataAdapter`, the database can send data back to your ADO.NET application as output parameters or as the first returned record of a result set. ADO.NET 可以检索这些值并在要更新的 中更新相应的列。ADO.NET can retrieve these values and update the corresponding columns in the being updated. 默认情况下，ADO.NET 调用`AcceptChanges`方法的`DataRow`更新后。By default, ADO.NET calls the `AcceptChanges` method of the `DataRow` after the update. 但是，如果你想要合并的更新的行回另一，您可能要保留的主键列的原始值。However, if you want to merge the updated row back into another , you may want to preserver the original value of a primary key column. 例如，在数据库中，标识列，如自动递增列相对应的主键列可以包含新数据库分配不匹配中分配的原始值的值`DataRow`。For example, a primary key column corresponding to an automatically incrementing column in the database, such as an identity column, can contain new values that are assigned by the database that do not match the original values assigned in the `DataRow`. 默认情况下`AcceptChanges`在更新，并在行中，可能被的原始值将隐式调用通过 ADO.NET，赋的值都将丢失。By default, `AcceptChanges` is called implicitly after an update, and the original values in the row, which may have been values assigned by ADO.NET, are lost. 您可以保留中的原始值`DataRow`通过防止`ADO.NET`调用`AcceptChanges`执行更新的行，通过设置后属性设置为`false`，这将保持原始值。You can preserve the original values in the `DataRow` by preventing `ADO.NET` from calling `AcceptChanges` after it performs an update on a row, by setting the property to `false`, which preserves the original values. > [!NOTE] > 设置`AcceptChangesDuringUpdate`属性设置为`false`适用于所有数据修改，而不仅仅是插入。Setting the `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` property to `false` applies to all data modifications, not only inserts. 如果你想要编辑或删除同一更新中的行，并想要取消显示调用`AcceptChanges`仅对插入，则而不是设置`AccceptChangesDuringUpdate`到`false`，使用的事件处理程序`RowUpdated`的事件`DataAdapter`。If you want to edit or delete rows in the same update, and if you want to suppress the call to `AcceptChanges` only for inserts, then instead of setting `AccceptChangesDuringUpdate` to `false`, use an event handler for the `RowUpdated` event of the `DataAdapter`. 在事件处理程序可以检查来确定如果数据修改是插入，以及是否`true`，请设置的属性到。In the event handler you can check the to determine if the data modification is an insert, and if `true`, set the property of the to . 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[检索标识或自动编号值](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-identity-or-autonumber-values.md)。For more information and an example, see [Retrieving Identity or Autonumber Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-identity-or-autonumber-values.md). ## Examples 此示例演示从 `DataTable` 中提取已更改的行，然后使用 更新数据源并检索新标识列值。This example demonstrates extracting changed rows from a `DataTable` and using a to update the data source and retrieve a new identity column value. 通过设置`AcceptChangesDuringUpdate`的属性到`false`若要保留原始的自动增量值，可以随之将新数据合并到原始，即使新的标识值与原始自动递增不匹配中的值`DataTable`。By setting the `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` property of the to `false` to preserve the original auto increment value, the new data can then be merged into the original , even if the new identity value does not match the original auto increment value in the `DataTable`. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate/VB/source.vb#1)]

The cloned instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法已弃用。This method is deprecated. 而不是此方法应使用构造函数。The constructor should be used instead of this method. 所有命令，则，和会克隆。All the commands, the , the , and the are cloned. 但是，这些命令的连接将不复制，而共享。However, the connections for the commands are not copied, but shared. 因此，克隆可用于原始连接相同的连接。Thus, the cloned can be used against the same connection as the original.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在行更新过程中遇到错误时是否生成异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to generate an exception when an error is encountered during a row update.

value.span: 若要继续而不会生成异常，则更新否则为。

span.span: to continue the update without generating an exception; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ContinueUpdateOnError`设置为`true`，不会引发异常的行更新期间发生错误时。If `ContinueUpdateOnError` is set to `true`, no exception is thrown when an error occurs during the update of a row. 跳过的行的更新并错误信息放入中错误的行的属性。The update of the row is skipped and the error information is placed in the property of the row in error. 继续更新后面的行。The continues to update subsequent rows. 如果`ContinueUpdateOnError`设置为`false`，行的更新的过程中发生错误时引发异常。If `ContinueUpdateOnError` is set to `false`, an exception is thrown when an error occurs during the update of a row.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请小心不要引用到的早期调用中释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 在 中添加或刷新行以与数据源中的行匹配。

span.span: Adds or refreshes rows in the to match those in the data source.

returns.span: 已在 中成功添加或刷新的行数。

span.span: The number of rows successfully added to or refreshed in the .

returns.span: 这不包括受不返回行的语句影响的行。

span.span: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用从数据源指定由关联的 SELECT 语句检索行属性。The method retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated property. 与 SELECT 语句关联的连接对象必须是有效的但它不需要打开。The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果连接已关闭之前是调用，它是打开以检索数据，然后关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果连接已打开之前是调用，它保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 然后，操作将行添加到目标中的对象，则创建对象如果它们尚不存在。The operation then adds the rows to destination objects in the , creating the objects if they do not already exist. 创建时对象，操作通常只创建列名称元数据。When creating objects, the operation normally creates only column name metadata. 但是，如果属性设置为`AddWithKey`，还会创建相应的主键约束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果 `SelectCommand` 返回 OUTER JOIN 的结果，则 `DataAdapter` 不会为生成的 设置 值。If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 必须显式定义为主键，以确保正确解析重复行。You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[定义主键](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 如果数据适配器在填充时遇到重复的列，它将生成后续列，请使用模式"columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3"等的名称。If the data adapter encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们将放置根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 当多个结果集添加到每个结果集放在一个单独的表。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 其他结果集分别名为通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2"等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称的应用程序应确保不会不会发生冲突与这些命名模式。Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. 当使用 SELECT 语句来填充返回多个结果，如批处理 SQL 语句，如果其中一个结果包含错误，所有后续结果被跳过且未添加到。When the SELECT statement used to populate the returns multiple results, such as a batch SQL statements, if one of the results contains an error, all subsequent results are skipped and not added to the . 可以使用方法上多次相同。You can use the method multiple times on the same . 如果存在主键，传入行与已存在的匹配行合并。If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist. 如果主键不存在，将传入的行追加到。If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the . > [!NOTE] > 当处理批处理 SQL 语句返回多个结果，实现的 OLE DB 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序检索架构信息只为第一个结果。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result. 若要检索多个结果的架构信息，请使用与设置为`AddWithKey`。To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use with the set to `AddWithKey`.

span.span: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.

summary.span: 在填充操作过程中出现错误时返回。

span.span: Returned when an error occurs during a fill operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **FillError**事件允许用户以确定是否在错误发生后应继续填充操作。The **FillError** event allows a user to determine whether or not the fill operation should continue after the error occurs. 情形的示例**FillError**事件可能是：Examples of when the **FillError** event might occur are: - 添加到的数据`DataSet`无法转换为公共语言运行时类型，而不会丢失精度。The data being added to a `DataSet` cannot be converted to a common language runtime type without losing precision. - 所添加的行包含数据违反了约束必须对实施`DataColumn`在`DataSet`。The row being added contains data that violates a Constraint that must be enforced on a `DataColumn` in the `DataSet`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema (System.Data.DataSet dataSet, System.Data.SchemaType schemaType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet, valuetype System.Data.SchemaType schemaType) cil managed
public: virtual cli::array <System::Data::DataTable ^> ^ FillSchema(System::Data::DataSet ^ dataSet, System::Data::SchemaType schemaType);
abstract member FillSchema : System.Data.DataSet * System.Data.SchemaType -> System.Data.DataTable[] override this.FillSchema : System.Data.DataSet * System.Data.SchemaType -> System.Data.DataTable[]

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 要用数据源中的架构填充的 。

span.span: The to be filled with the schema from the data source.

param.name: schemaType
param.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 将 添加到指定的 中，并根据指定的 配置架构以匹配数据源中的架构。

span.span: Adds a to the specified and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified .

returns.span: 包含从数据源返回的架构信息的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains schema information returned from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从使用数据源中检索架构。The method retrieves the schema from the data source using the . 与关联的连接对象必须有效，但它不需要打开。The connection object associated with the must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果连接已关闭之前是调用，它是打开以检索数据，然后关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data and then closed. 如果连接已打开之前是调用，它保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 一个操作将添加到目标。A operation adds a to the destination . 然后将添加到列的，并配置以下时它们的数据源中存在的属性：It then adds columns to the of the , and configures the following properties if they exist at the data source: - - 。. 必须设置和单独。You must set and separately. - - - 此外可以配置和属性根据以下规则： also configures the and properties according to the following rules: - 如果返回一个或多个主键列，那么，将其用作主键列。If one or more primary key columns are returned by the , they are used as the primary key columns for the . - 如果返回没有主键列但唯一列，唯一的列用作主键，当且仅当所有唯一列不可为 null。If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if, and only if, all the unique columns are nonnullable. 如果任何列都可以为 null，添加到，但未设置属性。If any of the columns are nullable, a is added to the , but the property is not set. - 如果返回主键列和唯一列，主键列用作主键列。If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the . > [!NOTE] > 基础数据存储区可能会允许不支持中的列属性，这将导致无法正确转换某些列属性。The underlying data store may allow column attributes that are not supported in a , which causes some column attributes to not translate correctly. 例如，SQL Server 允许标识列数据类型为 tinyint，而仅允许具有 Int16、 Int32 和 Int64属性集。For example, SQL Server allows an identity column with a data type of tinyint whereas a only allows Int16, Int32, and Int64 to have the property set. `FillSchema` 以无提示方式忽略情况下，不能准确地反映数据源，则引发任何异常。`FillSchema` silently ignores cases where the cannot accurately mirror the data source and throws no exception. 请注意主键和唯一约束添加到根据上述规则，但其他约束类型不会添加。Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the according to the preceding rules, but other constraint types are not added. 如果一个唯一聚集索引定义的一列或 SQL Server 表中的列，并且对一组单独的列，定义主键约束，则将返回的列的聚集索引中的名称。If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned. 若要返回的名称或主键列的名称，使用指定的主键索引名称的 SELECT 语句中的查询提示。To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index. 有关指定查询提示的详细信息，请参阅[查询提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/queries/hints-transact-sql-query)。For more information about specifying query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/queries/hints-transact-sql-query). 如果填充时遇到重复的列，它将生成的使用模式的后续列名称"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3"，依次类推。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on. 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们将放置根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 当多个结果集添加到每个结果集放在一个单独的表。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 其他结果集分别名为通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2"等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称的应用程序应确保不会不会发生冲突与这些命名模式。Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. 不返回任何行。 does not return any rows. 使用方法以将行添加到。Use the method to add rows to a . > [!NOTE] > 当处理批处理 SQL 语句返回多个结果，实现的 OLE DB 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序检索架构信息只为第一个结果。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result. 若要检索多个结果的架构信息，请使用与设置为`AddWithKey`。To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use with the set to `AddWithKey`.

[!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int Update (System.Data.DataSet dataSet);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Update(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet) cil managed
public: virtual int Update(System::Data::DataSet ^ dataSet);
abstract member Update : System.Data.DataSet -> int override this.Update : System.Data.DataSet -> int

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 用于更新数据源的 。

span.span: The used to update the data source.

summary.span: 从名为“Table”的 为指定的 中每个已插入、已更新或已删除的行调用相应的 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句。

span.span: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified from a named "Table."
The number of rows successfully updated from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由行的基础上执行更新。The update is performed on a by-row basis. 对于每个插入、 修改和已删除的行，方法确定已在其执行的更改的类型 （插入、 更新或删除）。For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (Insert, Update or Delete). 具体取决于更改类型`Insert`，`Update,`或`Delete`命令模板执行传播到数据源的已修改的行。Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update,` or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source. 当应用程序调用方法，检查属性，并执行所需的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句以迭代方式对于每一行，根据中配置的索引顺序.When an application calls the method, the examines the property, and executes the required INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements iteratively for each row, based on the order of the indexes configured in the . 例如，可能会执行 DELETE 语句后, 跟 INSERT 语句，并将另一个 DELETE 语句，由于中的行的排序。For example, might execute a DELETE statement, followed by an INSERT statement, and then another DELETE statement, due to the ordering of the rows in the . 应注意这些语句不会执行作为批处理过程;单独更新每个行。It should be noted that these statements are not performed as a batch process; each row is updated individually. 应用程序可以调用方法在其中你必须控制语句类型的序列的情况下 （例如，在更新之前插入）。An application can call the method in situations where you must control the sequence of statement types (for example, INSERT before UPDATE). 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information, see [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). 如果尚未指定 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，方法将引发异常。If INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements have not been specified, the method generates an exception. 但是，可以创建或对象来自动生成的单表更新的 SQL 语句，如果您设置`SelectCommand`的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性。However, you can create a or object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然后，你未设置任何其他 SQL 语句都由**CommandBuilder**。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the **CommandBuilder**. 此生成逻辑要求要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 方法从之前执行更新的第一个映射中列出的表中检索行。The method retrieves rows from the table listed in the first mapping before performing an update. 然后刷新使用的值的行属性。The then refreshes the row using the value of the property. 将忽略返回任何其他行。Any additional rows returned are ignored. 任何数据加载回后，则引发事件时，允许用户检查已对帐行和任何输出参数返回的命令。After any data is loaded back into the , the event is raised, allowing the user to inspect the reconciled row and any output parameters returned by the command. 已成功更新某一行后，将接受对该行更改。After a row updates successfully, the changes to that row are accepted. 当使用的执行顺序是按如下所示：When using , the order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，则第一个返回结果将放置在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, then the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果没有输出参数，它们将放置。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. 这将引发两并了已更新的事件。This will raise both the and events for the updated . 与相关联的每个命令通常有一个与之关联的参数集合。Each command associated with the usually has a parameters collection associated with it. 参数映射到当前行通过`SourceColumn`并`SourceVersion`的.NET 数据提供程序的属性`Parameter`类。Parameters are mapped to the current row through the `SourceColumn` and `SourceVersion` properties of a .NET data provider's `Parameter` class. `SourceColumn` 是指列的以获得当前行的参数值的引用。`SourceColumn` refers to a column that the references to obtain parameter values for the current row. `SourceColumn` 在应用的任何表映射之前是指未映射的列名称。`SourceColumn` refers to the unmapped column name before any table mappings have been applied. 如果`SourceColumn`引用不存在的列，所执行的操作取决于下列任一值。If `SourceColumn` refers to a nonexistent column, the action taken depends on one of the following values. |枚举值Enumeration value|执行操作Action taken| |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|使用源列名称和中的表名如果不不存在任何映射。Use the source column names and table names in the if no mapping is present.| |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|一个生成。A is generated. 当显式设置映射时，缺少映射的输入参数通常是错误的结果。When the mappings are explicitly set, a missing mapping for an input parameter is usually the result of an error.| |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|一个生成。A is generated.| `SourceColumn`属性还用于将映射为输出值或输入/输出参数返回到`DataSet`。The `SourceColumn` property is also used to map the value for output or input/output parameters back to the `DataSet`. 如果它所引用的列不存在，则会生成异常。An exception is generated if it refers to a nonexistent column. `SourceVersion`属性的.NET 数据提供程序的`Parameter`类确定是否使用该列的值的原始、 当前或已建议版本。The `SourceVersion` property of a .NET data provider's `Parameter` class determines whether to use the Original, Current, or Proposed version of the column value. 此功能通常用于包括检查存在开放式并发冲突的 UPDATE 语句的 WHERE 子句中的原始值。This capability is often used to include original values in the WHERE clause of an UPDATE statement to check for optimistic concurrency violations. 调用方法或方法将提交中的所有更改或。Calling the method or method will commit all changes in the or . 如果上述任一方法调用之前方法调用时，不会将更改提交时调用方法时，除非由于进行了进一步的更改，否则或调用。If either of these methods are called before the method is called, no changes will be committed when the method is called, unless further changes have been made since or was called. > [!NOTE] > 如果更新某行时出错，将引发异常并执行更新的已停用。If an error occurs while updating a row, an exception is thrown and execution of the update is discontinued. 若要继续更新操作不会生成异常时遇到错误，请设置属性设置为`true`然后才能调用。To continue the update operation without generating exceptions when an error is encountered, set the property to `true` before calling . 您还可能会响应中的每个行基础上的错误`RowUpdated`DataAdapter 事件。You may also respond to errors on a per-row basis within the `RowUpdated` event of a DataAdapter. 若要继续更新操作而不会生成内的异常`RowUpdated`事件中，设置的属性到。To continue the update operation without generating an exception within the `RowUpdated` event, set the property of the to . > > 每个列，则将传播到数据源上，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`参数属性应设置为的列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 此设置表示参数的值不手动设置，但获取自当前处理的行中的特定列。This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生的类中，到数据源。The following example uses the derived class, , to the data source.
